nodes.bodyText: Shall we replace this with push()?
check the tag instead of using instance of
check the type tag instead of instanceof
What will happen if we remove the cast  ?
it will throw error since map is any type map. Isn't that expected?
It is a compile time error. (i.e, operator '==' not defined for 'any' and 'string')
sorry, just now saw. That is an expected case.
ah yes.. sorry didnt see that m is a map
What will happen if the iterator object next method does not return an error but the stream has the errorType as the completionType?
It passes without throwing any error
Shall we add another test for iterable which returns an error as well?
